prf::DihedralGroup

prf::DihedralGroup Class Reference
[Geometrical objects]

The dihedral group or boomerang. More...

#include <DihedralGroup.hh>

Inherits prf::Node.

void Create ()
 Assign coordinates to atoms attached to outgoing bonds.

Detailed Description

This group with only one outgoing bond only occurs in Methionine, Serine Threonine and Tyrosine

Member Function Documentation

void DihedralGroup::Create (  )  [virtual]

Using the position of Base, Root and Junction, and the state of the degree of freedom associated with the node, find the coordinates of all other atoms in the node.

Reimplemented from prf::Node.
